Separate but Equal?

Jan 20, 2003

As Atrios says: “if race shouldn’t be a factor in admissions why should it be a factor in funding decisions?” Is Atrios correct that Bush wants to return to ‘separate but equal’?

“President Bush will propose funding increases for Hispanic-serving institutions and historically black colleges and universities in his 2004 budget, the White House said in a statement on Sunday, on the eve of the Martin Luther King Day holiday.”

ABCNEWS

Atrios
